google-auth.instr-1: You may select the level of permission that Buttercup will use while accessing your Google Drive account.
google-auth.instr-2: Selecting an open permission setting will grant Buttercup access to all files and folders in your account and connected shares.
google-auth.instr-3: Selecting a non-open setting will grant Buttercup access to files that it has created/accessed previously.

format.a-description: Format A is the original Buttercup vault format that uses deltas to store vault structure.
format.b-description: Format B is the new Buttercup vault format that uses a JSON structure to manage vault structure and history.
format.a-upgrade-b: You should upgrade to Format B, which is currently stable. It is recommended that you backup your vault before doing this.
format.description: Manage current vault format and updates.
format.title: Format
